tool_description: An API showing all the latest prices of cryptocurrencies
name: Crypto Currency live Prices
title: Crypto Currency live Prices

api_list.name: Get All  Crypto Currency Prices
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all prices about cryptocurrencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-currency-live-prices.p.rapidapi.com/cryptocurrencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-currency-live-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-currency-live-prices.p.rapidapi.com/cryptocurrencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-currency-live-prices.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
